name: prefix_77ds
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.77ds.com/"),url-prefix("http://www.77ds.net/") {
div#suidong, /*顶部随动*/
/*div#header_bg, 顶部*/
div#footer_bg, /*底部*/
div#bdshare, /*分享*/
div.gg960x60, /*广告*/
div.gg960x90, /*广告*/
div.zhuy_intro, /*主演相关*/
div#detail-intro, /*剧情介绍*/
div.sing_body, /*上一篇，下一篇*/
div.playbox_nav, /*播放导航*/
div.dc_intro, /*推荐*/
div.chapter-tip, /*下集预告*/
div#cs_left_couplet, /*左侧广告*/
div#cs_right_couplet, /*右侧广告*/
div#cs_right_bottom, /*右下广告*/
div[id$="_left"],
div[id$="_right"],
div#header_bg + center,
div.play-mode,
div.detail_vice,
div.detail_nav,
div#bg,
#hm_cpm_show, /*靓女show*/
[id^="f14"],
#goodsContent,
[id^="ads"],
div.link /*友情链接*/
{
  display: none !important;
}

a.nzr,
a.nzl
{
  width: auto!important;
}
}
